name: Offroad Rescue Truck Simulator
description:
It’s time to get into your truck, you’re on emergency rescue duty so you need to be ready to respond the emergency at any time! Perform your rescue duty as tow truck driver and drive mud runner truck to help people stuck in extreme conditions. Grab your gear and stay alert to respond emergency when the bell rings in station. Get behind the wheels of truck and drive towards the incident location to extinguish.

Drive multiple off-road vehicles: 4x4 jeep, 6x6 mud runner and 8x8 centipede truck. Drive mud runner trucks with incredible power, use manual controls to pull out cars and drive them back to garage. Take the towing challenge and rescue cars stuck in swamp and mud streams. Play Off-road Mud-Runner Tow Truck a sequel of best 6x6 mud runner truck. Perform your duty as tow truck driver and drive off-road truck through extreme countryside environment. Spin tires while driving 6x6 jeeps through muddy road and lift up cars stuck in marshes.

Features:
• Smooth controls
• 10 Challenging fire truck driving
• Epic 4x4 Jeep, 6x6 Mud runner, 8x8 Centipede Truck
• Realistic tow truck driving physics

Enjoy the amazing gameplay and give your feedback to help us improve this game in future releases.
